StarCluster

[ Module Hierarchy | Class Hierarchy ]

Class Hierarchy

  • SocketServer.BaseRequestHandler: Base class for request handler classes.
    • SocketServer.StreamRequestHandler: Define self.rfile and self.wfile for stream sockets.
      • BaseHTTPServer.BaseHTTPRequestHandler: HTTP request handler base class.
        • starcluster.webtools.BaseHandler
          • starcluster.webtools.DocrootHandler
            • starcluster.webtools.TemplateHandler: Simple GET handler that loads and renders files/templates within a package under the starcluster.templates package.
  • SocketServer.BaseServer: Base class for server classes.
    • SocketServer.TCPServer: Base class for various socket-based server classes.
      • BaseHTTPServer.HTTPServer
        • starcluster.webtools.StoppableHttpServer: http server that reacts to self.stop flag
  • logging.Filterer: A base class for loggers and handlers which allows them to share common code.
    • logging.Handler: Handler instances dispatch logging events to specific destinations.
      • starcluster.logger.NullHandler
      • logging.StreamHandler: A handler class which writes logging records, appropriately formatted, to a stream.
        • starcluster.logger.ConsoleLogger
  • rfc822.Message: Represents a single RFC 2822-compliant message.
    • mimetools.Message: A derived class of rfc822.Message that knows about MIME headers and contains some hooks for decoding encoded and multipart messages.
  • Queue.Queue: Create a queue object with a given maximum size.
    • workerpool.pools.WorkerPool: WorkerPool servers two functions: It is a Queue and a master of Worker threads.
      • starcluster.threadpool.ThreadPool
  • object: The most base type
    • starcluster.optcomplete.AllCompleter: Completes by listing all possible files in current directory.
    • webbrowser.BaseBrowser: Parent class for all browsers.
      • webbrowser.GenericBrowser: Class for all browsers started with a command and without remote functionality.
        • starcluster.webtools.BackgroundBrowser: Class for all browsers which are to be started in the background.
    • exceptions.BaseException: Common base class for all exceptions
      • exceptions.Exception: Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.
        • starcluster.exception.BaseException
          • starcluster.exception.AWSError: Base exception for all AWS related errors
            • starcluster.exception.AMIDoesNotExist
            • starcluster.exception.AWSUserIdRequired
            • starcluster.exception.BucketAlreadyExists
            • starcluster.exception.BucketDoesNotExist
            • starcluster.exception.EC2CertDoesNotExist
            • starcluster.exception.EC2CertRequired
            • starcluster.exception.EC2PrivateKeyDoesNotExist
            • starcluster.exception.EC2PrivateKeyRequired
            • starcluster.exception.InstanceDoesNotExist
            • starcluster.exception.InstanceNotRunning
            • starcluster.exception.InvalidBucketName
            • starcluster.exception.InvalidImageName
            • starcluster.exception.InvalidOperation
            • starcluster.exception.KeyPairDoesNotExist
            • starcluster.exception.PlacementGroupDoesNotExist
            • starcluster.exception.RegionDoesNotExist
            • starcluster.exception.SecurityGroupDoesNotExist
            • starcluster.exception.SnapshotDoesNotExist
            • starcluster.exception.SpotHistoryError
            • starcluster.exception.VolumeDoesNotExist
            • starcluster.exception.ZoneDoesNotExist
          • starcluster.exception.CancelledCreateImage
          • starcluster.exception.CancelledCreateVolume
          • starcluster.exception.CancelledEBSImageCreation
          • starcluster.exception.CancelledStartRequest
          • starcluster.exception.ClusterDoesNotExist: Exception raised when user requests a running cluster that does not exist
          • starcluster.exception.ClusterExists
          • starcluster.exception.ClusterNotRunning: Exception raised when user requests a running cluster that does not exist
          • starcluster.exception.ClusterReceiptError: Raised when creating/loading a cluster receipt fails
          • starcluster.exception.ClusterTemplateDoesNotExist: Exception raised when user requests a cluster template that does not exist
          • starcluster.exception.CommandNotFound: Raised when command is not found on the system's PATH
            • starcluster.exception.RemoteCommandNotFound: Raised when command is not found on a *remote* system's PATH
          • starcluster.exception.ConfigError: Base class for all config related errors
            • starcluster.exception.ConfigHasNoSections
            • starcluster.exception.ConfigNotFound
            • starcluster.exception.ConfigSectionMissing
            • starcluster.exception.KeyNotFound
            • starcluster.exception.NoDefaultTemplateFound
            • starcluster.exception.PluginNotFound
          • starcluster.exception.ExperimentalFeature
          • starcluster.exception.IncompatibleCluster
          • starcluster.exception.InvalidDevice
          • starcluster.exception.InvalidIsoDate
          • starcluster.exception.InvalidPartition
          • starcluster.exception.PluginError: Base class for plugin errors
            • starcluster.exception.PluginLoadError: Raised when an error is encountered while loading a plugin
            • starcluster.exception.PluginSyntaxError: Raised when plugin contains syntax errors
          • starcluster.exception.SCPException: SCP exception class
          • starcluster.exception.SSHError: Base class for all SSH related errors
            • starcluster.exception.SSHAuthException: Raised when an ssh connection fails to authenticate
            • starcluster.exception.SSHConnectionError: Raised when ssh fails to to connect to a host (socket error)
            • starcluster.exception.SSHNoCredentialsError
          • starcluster.exception.ThreadPoolException
          • starcluster.exception.ValidationError: Base class for validation related errors
            • starcluster.exception.ClusterValidationError: Cluster validation related errors
              • starcluster.exception.IncompatibleSettings: Raised when two or more settings conflict with each other
              • starcluster.exception.InvalidCIDRSpecified: Raised when user specifies an invalid CIDR ip for permission
              • starcluster.exception.InvalidPortRange: Raised when user specifies an invalid port range for permission
              • starcluster.exception.InvalidProtocol: Raised when user specifies an invalid IP protocol for permission
              • starcluster.exception.InvalidZone: Raised when a zone has been specified that does not match the common zone of the volumes being attached
              • starcluster.exception.MasterDoesNotExist: Raised when no master node is available
              • starcluster.exception.VolumesZoneError
            • starcluster.exception.NoClusterNodesFound: Raised if no cluster nodes are found
            • starcluster.exception.NoClusterSpotRequests: Raised if no spot requests belonging to a cluster are found
        • exceptions.StandardError: Base class for all standard Python exceptions that do not represent interpreter exiting.
          • exceptions.AssertionError: Assertion failed.
    • starcluster.cluster.Cluster
      • starcluster.volume.VolumeCreator: Handles creating, partitioning, and formatting a new EBS volume.
    • starcluster.clustersetup.ClusterSetup: ClusterSetup Interface
      • starcluster.clustersetup.DefaultClusterSetup: Default ClusterSetup implementation for StarCluster
        • starcluster.plugins.tmux.TmuxControlCenter: Starts a TMUX session on StarCluster configured with split panes for all nodes.
      • starcluster.plugins.ipcluster.IPCluster: Starts an IPCluster on StarCluster
      • starcluster.tests.mytestplugin.SetupClass
      • starcluster.tests.mytestplugin.SetupClass2
      • starcluster.tests.mytestplugin.SetupClass3
    • starcluster.optcomplete.CmdComplete: Simple default base class implementation for a subcommand that supports command completion.
      • starcluster.commands.base.CmdBase: Base class for StarCluster commands
        • starcluster.commands.createkey.CmdCreateKey: createkey [options] <name>
        • starcluster.commands.createvolume.CmdCreateVolume: createvolume [options] <volume_size> <volume_zone>
          • starcluster.commands.resizevolume.CmdResizeVolume: resizevolume [options] <volume_id> <volume_size>
        • starcluster.commands.help.CmdHelp: help
        • starcluster.commands.listbuckets.CmdListBuckets: listbuckets
        • starcluster.commands.listimages.CmdListImages: listimages [options]
        • starcluster.commands.listinstances.CmdListInstances: listinstances [options]
        • starcluster.commands.listkeypairs.CmdListKeyPairs: listkeypairs
        • starcluster.commands.listpublic.CmdListPublic: listpublic
        • starcluster.commands.listregions.CmdListRegions: listregions
        • starcluster.commands.listspots.CmdListSpots: listspots
        • starcluster.commands.listvolumes.CmdListVolumes: listvolumes
        • starcluster.commands.listzones.CmdListZones: listzones
        • starcluster.commands.removekey.CmdRemoveKey: removekey [options] <name>
        • starcluster.commands.runplugin.CmdRunPlugin: runplugin <plugin_name> <cluster_tag>
        • starcluster.commands.shell.CmdShell: shell
        • starcluster.commands.showbucket.CmdShowBucket: showbucket <bucket>
        • starcluster.commands.spothistory.CmdSpotHistory: spothistory [options] <instance_type>
        • starcluster.commands.completers.Completer: Base class for all completer classes
          • starcluster.commands.completers.ClusterCompleter: Returns a list of all cluster names as completion options
            • starcluster.commands.addnode.CmdAddNode: addnode [options] <cluster_tag>
            • starcluster.commands.config.CmdConfig: config [<cluster_tag> ...]
            • starcluster.commands.get.CmdGet: get [options] <cluster_tag> [<remote_file_or_dir> ...] <local_destination>
            • starcluster.commands.listclusters.CmdListClusters: listclusters [<cluster_tag> ...]
            • starcluster.commands.loadbalance.CmdLoadBalance: loadbalance <cluster_tag>
            • starcluster.commands.put.CmdPut: put [options] <cluster_tag> [<local_file_or_dir> ...] <remote_destination>
            • starcluster.commands.removenode.CmdRemoveNode: removenode [options] <cluster_tag> <node> [<node> ...]
            • starcluster.commands.restart.CmdRestart: restart [options] <cluster_tag>
            • starcluster.commands.sshmaster.CmdSshMaster: sshmaster [options] <cluster>
            • starcluster.commands.start.CmdStart: start [options] <cluster_tag>
            • starcluster.commands.stop.CmdStop: stop [options] <cluster_tag> ...
            • starcluster.commands.terminate.CmdTerminate: terminate [options] <cluster_tag> ...
          • starcluster.commands.completers.EBSImageCompleter: Returns a list of all registered EBS image ids as completion options
          • starcluster.commands.completers.ImageCompleter: Returns a list of all registered image ids as completion options
            • starcluster.commands.removeimage.CmdRemoveImage: removeimage [options] <imageid>
          • starcluster.commands.completers.InstanceCompleter: Returns a list of all instance ids as completion options
            • starcluster.commands.ebsimage.CmdEbsImage: ebsimage [options] <instance-id> <image_name>
            • starcluster.commands.s3image.CmdS3Image: s3image [options] <instance-id> <image_name> [<bucket>]
            • starcluster.commands.showconsole.CmdShowConsole: showconsole <instance-id>
            • starcluster.commands.sshinstance.CmdSshInstance: sshinstance [options] <instance-id>
          • starcluster.commands.completers.NodeCompleter: Returns a list of all node names as completion options
            • starcluster.commands.sshnode.CmdSshNode: sshnode <cluster> <node>
          • starcluster.commands.completers.S3ImageCompleter: Returns a list of all registered S3 image ids as completion options
            • starcluster.commands.downloadimage.CmdDownloadImage: downloadimage [options] <image_id> <destination_directory>
            • starcluster.commands.showimage.CmdShowImage: showimage <image_id>
          • starcluster.commands.completers.VolumeCompleter: Returns a list of all volume ids as completion options
            • starcluster.commands.removevolume.CmdRemoveVolume: removevolume [options] <volume_id>
    • starcluster.optcomplete.DirCompleter: Completes by listing subdirectories only.
    • starcluster.awsutils.EasyAWS
      • starcluster.awsutils.EasyEC2
      • starcluster.awsutils.EasyS3
    • starcluster.image.ImageCreator: Base class for S3/EBS Image Creators.
      • starcluster.image.EBSImageCreator: Creates a new EBS image from a running instance
      • starcluster.image.S3ImageCreator: Class for creating a new instance-store AMI from a running instance
    • starcluster.iptools.IpRange: Range of ip addresses.
    • starcluster.iptools.IpRangeList: List of IpRange objects.
    • workerpool.jobs.Job: Interface for a Job object.
      • workerpool.jobs.SimpleJob: Given a `result` queue, a `method` pointer, and an `args` dictionary or list, the method will execute r = method(*args) or r = method(**args), depending on args' type, and perform result.put(r).
        • starcluster.threadpool.SimpleJob
    • starcluster.optcomplete.ListCompleter: Completes by filtering using a fixed list of strings.
    • starcluster.balancers.LoadBalancer: Base class for all load balancers
      • starcluster.balancers.sge.SGELoadBalancer: This class is able to query each SGE host and return load & queue statistics
    • starcluster.managers.Manager: Base class for all Manager classes in StarCluster
      • starcluster.cluster.ClusterManager: Manager class for Cluster objects
      • starcluster.node.NodeManager: Manager class for Node objects
    • starcluster.node.Node: This class represents a single compute node in a StarCluster.
    • starcluster.optcomplete.NoneCompleter: Generates empty completion list.
    • starcluster.progressbar.ProgressBar: This is the ProgressBar class, it updates and prints the bar.
    • starcluster.progressbar.ProgressBarWidget: This is an element of ProgressBar formatting.
      • starcluster.progressbar.ETA: Widget for the Estimated Time of Arrival
      • starcluster.progressbar.FileTransferSpeed: Widget for showing the transfer speed (useful for file transfers).
      • starcluster.progressbar.Fraction: Just the fraction done.
      • starcluster.progressbar.Percentage: Just the percentage done.
      • starcluster.progressbar.RotatingMarker: A rotating marker for filling the bar of progress.
    • starcluster.progressbar.ProgressBarWidgetHFill: This is a variable width element of ProgressBar formatting.
      • starcluster.progressbar.Bar: The bar of progress.
        • starcluster.progressbar.ReverseBar: The reverse bar of progress, or bar of regress.
    • starcluster.optcomplete.RegexCompleter: Completes by filtering all possible files with the given list of regexps.
    • starcluster.scp.SCPClient: An scp1 implementation, compatible with openssh scp.
    • starcluster.balancers.sge.SGEStats: SunGridEngine stats parser
    • starcluster.balancers.sge.visualizer.SGEVisualizer: Stats Visualizer for SGE Load Balancer stats_file - file containing SGE load balancer stats pngpath - directory to dump the stat plots to
    • starcluster.ssh.SSHClient: Establishes an SSH connection to a remote host using either password or private key authentication.
    • starcluster.ssh.SSHGlob
    • starcluster.cli.StarClusterCLI: StarCluster Command Line Interface
    • starcluster.config.StarClusterConfig: Loads StarCluster configuration settings defined in config_file which defaults to ~/.starclustercfg
    • unittest.TestCase: A class whose instances are single test cases.
      • starcluster.tests.StarClusterTest
        • starcluster.tests.test_cluster_validation.TestClusterValidation
        • starcluster.tests.test_sge_balancer.TestSGELoadBalancer
        • starcluster.tests.test_config.TestStarClusterConfig
        • starcluster.tests.test_threadpool.TestThreadPool
    • threading._Verbose
      • threading.Thread
        • starcluster.spinner.Spinner
        • workerpool.workers.Worker: A loyal worker who will pull jobs from the `jobs` queue and perform them.
          • starcluster.threadpool.DaemonWorker: Improved Worker that sets daemon = True by default and also handles communicating exceptions to the parent pool object by adding them to the parent pool's exception queue
    • dict: dict() -> new empty dictionary dict(mapping) -> new dictionary initialized from a mapping object's (key, value) pairs dict(iterable) -> new dictionary initialized as if via: d = {} for k, v in iterable: d[k] = v dict(**kwargs) -> new dictionary initialized with the name=value pairs in the keyword argument list.
      • starcluster.utils.AttributeDict: Subclass of dict that allows read-only attribute-like access to dictionary key/values
